Revolutionize Your Salesforce Experience with the Ultimate Salesforce Toolkit

Inspired by the renowned "Salesforce Inspector," the Salesforce Toolkit is designed to be your all-in-one solution, aiming to consolidate and enhance all the functionalities you need in one powerful Chrome extension. Whether you're a Salesforce admin, developer, or power user, this toolkit is engineered to replace the deprecated Workbench and become the single tool you’ll ever need.

Why Choose Salesforce Toolkit?

Unified Credential Management: Securely manage your Salesforce orgs with OAuth 2.0, eliminating the need to store passwords, and access all your environments effortlessly.

Record Field Viewer: Quickly visualize and search your Salesforce records directly within your browser, optimizing your workflow without the need to switch between tools.

Einstein Integration: Supercharge your Salesforce operations with an AI-powered personal assistant, available if Einstein is enabled in your org, for smarter and more efficient task management.

Advanced SOQL and Anonymous Apex Editor: Work with the most advanced and feature-rich SOQL and Anonymous Apex editor on the market, designed for developers who demand the best.

Real-Time Event Subscription: Monitor and test Platform Events and Change Data Capture events in real-time, ensuring your Salesforce environment is always in sync and functioning flawlessly.

Direct Access, No Login Required: Enjoy immediate, one-click access to all SF Toolkit features without logging in, thanks to its seamless integration with your current sessionId.

Expandable and Continuously Updated: Stay ahead with weekly updates that consistently add new features and improvements, ensuring you always have the most up-to-date tools at your fingertips.

Key Features at a Glance:

Secured Credential Manager: Simplify access to your orgs with secure, password-free management.
Record Field Viewer: Access and search record data directly within your browser.
Einstein Integration: Utilize a personal assistant powered by Salesforce Einstein.
SOQL and Apex Editor: Experience the most advanced editing tools available today.
Event Subscription: Effortlessly test and monitor platform events and data changes.
Direct Access & More: Instantly access the full suite of SF Toolkit features without logging in.
A Tool Inspired by Greatness:

Inspired by the legendary "Salesforce Inspector," the SF Toolkit builds on this legacy by aiming to be the ultimate Chrome extension that does it all—replacing the deprecated Workbench and streamlining your Salesforce experience like never before.

Elevate your Salesforce operations with the SF Toolkit—the most comprehensive, continually updated toolset designed to make your workflow more efficient, powerful, and user-friendly. Join the revolution today!
